pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sample Size Determination for Longitudinal Designs with Binary Outcome // Provides the necessary sample size for a longitudinal study with binary outcome in order to attain a pre-specified power while strictly maintaining the Type I error rate. Kapur K, Bhaumik R, Tang XC, Hur K, Reda DJ, Bhaumik D (2014) doi:10.1002/sim.6203.
